programme.title: NBA TV Marquee Matchup
programme.desc: Giannis Antetokounmpo had 32 points and 12 rebounds to lead the Milwaukee Bucks to a 133-129 victory over the Chicago Bulls in overtime. DeMar DeRozan had 41 points and Coby White scored 33 for Chicago, which had won four straight.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: The death of their childhood basketball coach leads to a reunion for some old friends (Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock), who gather at the site of a championship celebration years earlier. Picking up where they left off, the buddies -- with wives and children in tow -- discover why age does not, necessarily, equal maturity.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny Feder (Adam Sandler) moves his family back to his hometown to be with his friends, but he finds -- what with old bullies, new bullies, party crashers and more -- that he hasn't left the crazy life behind in Los Angeles. Lenny's friends must also cope with their own challenges: Eric (Kevin James) must face his ultimate fear; Kurt (Chris Rock) has gone back to work as a cable repairman; and Marcus (David Spade) learns that he has an 18-year-old son.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Rampage
programme.desc: The stars of "All Elite Wrestling" compete against each other, displaying strength, athleticism, charisma and creativity to win the match and the audience's approval.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: The death of their childhood basketball coach leads to a reunion for some old friends (Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock), who gather at the site of a championship celebration years earlier. Picking up where they left off, the buddies -- with wives and children in tow -- discover why age does not, necessarily, equal maturity.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny Feder (Adam Sandler) moves his family back to his hometown to be with his friends, but he finds -- what with old bullies, new bullies, party crashers and more -- that he hasn't left the crazy life behind in Los Angeles. Lenny's friends must also cope with their own challenges: Eric (Kevin James) must face his ultimate fear; Kurt (Chris Rock) has gone back to work as a cable repairman; and Marcus (David Spade) learns that he has an 18-year-old son.

programme.title: That's My Boy
programme.desc: While still a teen himself, Donny (Adam Sandler) fathered a son,Todd (Andy Samberg), and raised him as a single parent. On Todd's 18th birthday, Donny cut the youth loose. After years of estrangement,the older man shows up unexpectedly on the eve of his son's wedding day, sending the young man's life into a tailspin. Donny wants desperately to reconnect with Todd, but he must now deal with the repercussions of the bad parenting he exhibited in the past.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: Rush and Valens try to connect a murder from 1977 to a serial killer about to be released from prison on a legal technicality.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: When a truck containing human bones is retrieved from the Delaware River, Rush and Valens link the truck to a Prohibition bootlegger and believe the remains are those of a woman who went missing in 1932.

programme.title: Cold Case
programme.desc: The discovery of nine human skulls prompts Rush to look again at a serial killer she was unable to put away months earlier, flushing him from hiding for a final showdown.

programme.title: Birds of Prey (and the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn)
programme.desc: It's open season on Harley Quinn when her explosive breakup with the Joker puts a big fat target on her back. Unprotected and on the run, Quinn faces the wrath of narcissistic crime boss Black Mask, his right-hand man, Victor Zsasz, and every other thug in the city. But things soon even out for Harley when she becomes unexpected allies with three deadly women -- Huntress, Black Canary and Renee Montoya.

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: Forever alone in a crowd, failed comedian Arthur Fleck seeks connection as he walks the streets of Gotham City. Arthur wears two masks -- the one he paints for his day job as a clown, and the guise he projects in a futile attempt to feel like he's part of the world around him. Isolated, bullied and disregarded by society, Fleck begins a slow descent into madness as he transforms into the criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fueled by his restored faith in humanity and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes -- Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash -- it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: The Batman
programme.desc: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues. As the scale of the perpetrator's plans become clear, he must bring justice to the abuse of power and corruption that plagues the metropolis.

programme.title: All Elite Wrestling: Collision
programme.desc: Exciting new matches, more stories and more action, featuring the world-class All Elite Wrestling roster.

programme.title: Godzilla vs. Kong
programme.desc: Kong and his protectors undertake a perilous journey to find his true home. Along for the ride is Jia, an orphaned girl who has a unique and powerful bond with the mighty beast. However, they soon find themselves in the path of an enraged Godzilla as he cuts a swath of destruction across the globe. The initial confrontation between the two titans -- instigated by unseen forces -- is only the beginning of the mystery that lies deep within the core of the planet.

programme.title: Godzilla: King of the Monsters
programme.desc: Members of the crypto-zoological agency Monarch face off against a battery of god-sized monsters, including the mighty Godzilla, who collides with Mothra, Rodan, and his ultimate nemesis, the three-headed King Ghidorah. When these ancient super-species-thought to be mere myths-rise again, they all vie for supremacy, leaving humanity's very existence hanging in the balance.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride travels to New York City after new DNA evidence is linked to a 20-year-old cold case from his past.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team uncovers a sinister plot by a private detention center contracted by the government to house undocumented immigrants; Lasalle and Sebastian travel to Alabama to search for Lasalle's missing brother.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After tracking Apollyon, a deadly underground spy network, to war-torn South Ossetia, Pride is separated from the team and faces grave danger; in order to save Pride, the NCIS team must locate a mole who continues to feed information to Apollyon.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: After Pride's assistant escapes from a kidnapper, the team uncovers evidence of a suspect who is harvesting organs from multiple victims; Pride turns to a friend for guidance as he struggles with the ramifications of his recent brush with death.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Following a deadly car explosion in the French Quarter, the team interrogates a professor and former member of a student protest organization; Tammy discovers a secret about Hannah's personal life.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The team places Mateo Diaz, a high school gang member turned informant, in protective custody while they investigate the murder of his junior reserve officers' training corps instructor; Pride needs his brother's help to gain Mateo's trust.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

programme.desc: Pratite Saudijsku profesionalnu ligu, najvišu fudbalsku ligu u ligaškom sistemu Saudijske Arabije. Osnovana je 1976. godine kao prva profesionalna fudbalska liga Kraljevine Saudijske Arabije.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Trenuci koji će zauvek ostati upisani u istoriji sporta. Koševi, golovi i dostignuća koja su uvek neiscrpna tema među ljubiteljima sporta...

programme.title: Košarka - prijateljska (Atina): Partizan - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: Pratite prijateljsku utakmicu i saznajte u kakvoj su formi neki od najboljih košarkaša pred početak velikih takmičenja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Elversberg - Ulm 1846
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo. (LIVE).

programme.title: Košarka - Litvanska liga: Siauliai - Zalgiris
programme.desc: U ovoj zemlji, košarka je religija. Žalgiris je "dežurni krivac", ali nikada ne otpisujte klubove kao što su Ritas i Lijetkabelis. (LIVE).

programme.title: SK Mix
programme.desc: Najbolji, najsmešniji, najčudniji, sve što ima veze sa superlativima videćete u ovom specijalnom kolažu. I verujte, neće vam biti dovoljno da ga odgledate samo jednom...

programme.title: Rukomet - Nemačka liga: Magdeburg - Kiel
programme.desc: Rukometna Bundesliga je najviši rang takmičenja u Nemačkoj. Kvalitetom igre smatra se jednim od najkvalitetnijih rukometnih liga na svetu. (LIVE).

programme.title: ATP Uncovered
programme.desc: Teniseri su gotovo celu godinu na putovanjima. Saznajte nešto više o tome kako izgleda njihov život na terenu i van njega i kako organizatori ATP turnira rešavaju slatke i gorke muke koje imaju.

programme.title: Fudbal - Slovenačka 1. liga: Domžale - Celje
programme.desc: Prethodnih sezona gledali smo veoma zanimljiva prvenstva u Sloveniji i dobijali iznenađujuće ishode. Da li će tako biti i ove sezone? (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Fenerbahce - Galatasaray
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: Oklahoma - Tennessee
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...
